details: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of computer science, including programming, algorithms, and data structures.
Learn about advanced data structures and algorithms, and how to apply them to solve real-world problems.
Explore the principles and techniques of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning.
Learn to build dynamic and interactive web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Explore the field of artificial intelligence, including natural language processing and computer vision.
Learn about database design, SQL, and how to build and maintain efficient database systems.
Study the principles and best practices of software engineering, including agile development methodologies.
Explore the fundamentals of computer networking, including protocols, routing, and network security.
Learn about cybersecurity threats, risk assessment, and how to protect computer systems and data.
